name: Chop Chop Caveman
description:
Make sure you download NINJA NATIONS! It's our best game ever, it's brand new and it's free!

----------------------------------------------

FINGER LICKIN’ GOOD!

Over 1.8 million downloads!
"Easily ranks among the best platformers of the AppStore" –Gamezebo
"a MUST have" –NoDpad

Caveman is hungry! Embark on an EPIC quest for food across prehistoric lands and eat
everything that comes your way!
Are you hungry enough?

Features:
*20 levels across four worlds
*Choose your own way to play: Use the Dpad or the intuitive touch gameplay
*Spectacular boss fights
*Colorful & cartoonish graphics
*Hidden objects
*Loads of achievements
*Universal Game

Join the community on Facebook: www.facebook.com/gamerizon
Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/gamerizon

Chop Chop Caveman™ is a trademark from Gamerizon Studios Inc.
